smoothies.Name: Strawberry Banana
smoothies.Recipe: Blend 1 cup of strawberries, 1 banana, ½ cup of Greek yogurt, 1 tablespoon of honey, and 1 cup of almond milk. Blend until smooth.

smoothies.Name: Green Detox
smoothies.Recipe: Combine 1 cup of spinach, 1 cup of kale, 1 green apple (cored and chopped), ½ cucumber, 1 tablespoon of lemon juice, and 1 cup of coconut water. Blend until smooth.

smoothies.Name: Mango Pineapple
smoothies.Recipe: Blend 1 cup of mango, 1 cup of pineapple, 1 cup of orange juice, ½ cup of coconut milk, and 1 tablespoon of chia seeds. Blend until smooth and creamy.
